item.title: Galactic CTF Announcement
item.author: Author
item.description: Starting on the 9th of August 2022 at 12:00 UTC CUEH is proud to host the first internal Coventry University group CTF.

item.title: 12 Days of Christmas CTF
item.author: Author
item.description: Dear Loyal Subjects, The Three Kings have received a prophecy about the birth of God’s son in twelve daysâ€™ time! Unfortunately, King Herald has also heard this news and has ordered the death of all babies within his kingdom. Since King Herald has many spies, we have had to enclose hidden information within this letter. Can you help the three Kings reach God’s son and ensure his safety? To do this, each day there will be three daily challenges to complete for the next 12 days (starting 26th December) with varying difficulties aimed at a range of abilities.
